channel.title: analysis on Emma Hastings's RStudio Blog
channel.description: Recent content in analysis on Emma Hastings's RStudio Blog

item.title: Explaining the Split - How Nebraska Volleyball Lost to a Team They Beat 24 Hours Before
item.description: There is no doubt that Nebraska is a volleyball school. After three visits to the NCAA Championship in the last 5 years, including 2 national championships, it would be insane to argue against it. Resultingly, any team playing the Cornhuskers really has to step up their game to compete, let alone make an attempt at getting a +1 in their win column. In mid-March, Ohio State was the next team to face off against the Huskers.

item.title: Blog 1 - SPMC 350
item.description: This is the blog post that I will use to display my first SPMC 350 project concerning whether momentum in volleyball actually matters.
